price: 40. Qhiyaamah ayroh ugut nel xabciniih cagalah Ni maxco nanu tu fanne nee tekkek tik teetik innaah, edde takke iyye Yalli.
arabic: إِنَّمَا قَوۡلُنَا لِشَيۡءٍ إِذَآ أَرَدۡنَٰهُ أَن نَّقُولَ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: innamā qawlunā lishayin idhā aradnāhu an naqūla lahu kun fayakūnu
